From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-12-10 14:02
Subject: Travel Update, New Structure and Accountability Change Policies, TUMI's Revamped Store, The Deal X Dyson Private Sale, Transform Chalhoub Team Building Offsite, Retail Academy Graduation in Egypt, Bahraini Women's Day & Partnering...
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/6IR6FEQTzUudc_oAdRVpYQ/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/6IR6FEQTzUudc_oAdRVpYQ/550450/5DD1232732CF1D37DD032DBFC2431B69/pexels-camcasey-1157255-2.jpg> 	

TRAVEL UPDATE


In light of the recent events taking place in Syria, we hope that you and your families remain safe during this time.

We would also like to share important updates regarding travel:

Business Travel and Working from Abroad:
- Business travel to Syria and working remotely from the country are banned until further notice.
- Business travel to Lebanon and working remotely from the country remain prohibited. 

Please feel free to reach out to HR if you have any questions or require support.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/6IR6FEQTzUudc_oAdRVpYQ/544568/7D64A36114D9CE0A40BEBE1C24CFC3F5/nuggets-07.png>

<https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/6IR6FEQTzUudc_oAdRVpYQ/544568/7D64A36114D9CE0A40BEBE1C24CFC3F5/nuggets-07.png> 	

INTRODUCING THE NEW STRUCTURE AND ACCOUNTABILITY CHANGE POLICIES


 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/6IR6FEQTzUudc_oAdRVpYQ/550721/4509FB5103FC000948653719BA32E22C/08c1bf1109bdcb001c64b18a04c325c90e14c2dd.jpg> 	
To foster clarity and transparency in our organisational processes, we are launching two new policies designed to support growth and ensure equitable opportunities for everyone at the Group.

Structure Change Policy: provides clear guidelines for initiating and implementing changes to our organisational structure, with fairness, consistency, and transparency in all structural adjustments. Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252fpolicy%252fstructure-change-policy%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWVcNfZ6U5zRlqglpMgepzArDR4B7hpDOuvYFAubhAou2%252fEbohA3yQp7GGGMS2tRfw4khDeUfv%252frJ%252b0ItMJVfShLxYCZlEx2Pc5zip%252fbON6CWcn47EhIJ1zQiMXvlaCvmubhxgHC0ciFFq8itGQimRMhIs7BVAAFB%252b%252brvMISq4YbNbOehaVYe9xoq0UqYMsLwvTK%252bG2Yh%252fzCTSeFKi4aDZVXayrjrckvN%252br3yrTD75rQl&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cd37f5c03018d45a87ca908dd1901ba5a%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638694217410443316%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=2dAs7Nf3HPWmQcMvkerPT%2FjMCQQDsbZeGdekBerGszE%3D&reserved=0> 
Accountability Change Policy: defines how and why accountability changes happen, ensuring updates to jobs and accountabilities are handled thoughtfully and fairly.

We remain committed to fostering an environment that’s fair, open, and inclusive for everyone.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/6IR6FEQTzUudc_oAdRVpYQ/544518/EA5451AEC8C1A8A08E231DEEFE8086E5/nuggets-10.png> 	

UNVEILING TUMI'S REVAMPED STORE AT DUBAI MALL

Last week, TUMI revealed its transformed store at The Dubai Mall, reflecting TUMI’s dedication to innovation, craftsmanship, and creating experiences that elevate every journey. Formula 1 team driver and TUMI global brand ambassador Lando Norris joined TUMI's creative director, Victor Sanz, for the unveiling.

THE DEAL X DYSON PRIVATE STAFF SALE STARTS TODAY

Up to 75% off on Dyson products exclusively on The Deal.

Book a time slot now <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.picktime.com%252fprivatesaleinvite%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWVcNfZ6U5zRlqglpMgepzArDR4B7hpDOuvYFAubhAou2%252fEbohA3yQp7GGGMS2tRfw4khDeUfv%252frJ%252b0ItMJVfShLxYCZlEx2Pc5zip%252fbON6CWcn47EhIJ1zQiMXvlaCvmubhxgHC0ciFFq8itGQimRMhIs7BVAAFB%252b%252brvMISq4YbNbOehaVYe9xoq0UqYMsLwvTK%252bG2Yh%252fzCTSeFKi4aDZVXayrjrckvN%252br3yrTD75rQl&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cd37f5c03018d45a87ca908dd1901ba5a%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638694217410498369%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=HaW8jaV9Nbt0xf1A1DDBijLaXlit5qRiWdR7M2y7NmU%3D&reserved=0>

TRANSFORM CHALHOUB TEAM BUILDING OFFSITE

Our Transform Chalhoub programme held its first team building event, bringing together 80 members from the Group, Accenture, SAP, Blue Yonder, and Kearney. The event, designed by Chalhoub University, fostered engagement and helped break down organisational barriers, creating a unified transformation team. Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252fspace%252fMTI%25253D%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWVcNfZ6U5zRlqglpMgepzArDR4B7hpDOuvYFAubhAou2%252fEbohA3yQp7GGGMS2tRfw4khDeUfv%252frJ%252b0ItMJVfShLxYCZlEx2Pc5zip%252fbON6CWcn47EhIJ1zQiMXvlaCvmubhxgHC0ciFFq8itGQimRMhIs7BVAAFB%252b%252brvMISq4YbNbOehaVYe9xoq0UqYMsLwvTK%252bG2Yh%252fzCTSeFKi4aDZVXayrjrckvN%252br3yrTD75rQl&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cd37f5c03018d45a87ca908dd1901ba5a%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638694217410512270%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=L1mGIhacIBcZqd1HOIYg1QYBZV6OnDm3yMk3q7QP7EA%3D&reserved=0>

RETAIL ACADEMY GRADUATION IN EGYPT

Last week, we celebrated 141 CRVQ graduates, 2 L1 CAP achievers, and 3 Excellence Award recipients at our Retail Academy Graduation in Egypt. The day was filled with inspiration and success stories.

Congratulations to all our graduates for their dedication and achievements!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/6IR6FEQTzUudc_oAdRVpYQ/550723/B6D41F617AFCFB187C59450477B5CC9D/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-68.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/6IR6FEQTzUudc_oAdRVpYQ/545541/415E790A6337802D8EADC4304D6268B1/nuggets-49.png> 	

CELEBRATING BAHRAINI WOMEN'S DAY

In honor of Bahraini Women's Day, our team members in Bahrain celebrated the theme "Women, Worthy Partners in Nation-Building" by presenting roses to all our female colleagues. 

This gesture recognised their invaluable contributions and commitment to our Group and the community.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/6IR6FEQTzUudc_oAdRVpYQ/550727/0EF83179F79F991205521F645C96680A/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-69.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/6IR6FEQTzUudc_oAdRVpYQ/545547/8A83D6202E61CDC830AC94A76049FF1E/nuggets-55.png>

80A/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-69.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/6IR6FEQTzUudc_oAdRVpYQ/545547/8A83D6202E61CDC830AC94A76049FF1E/nuggets-55.png> 	

PARTNERING WITH THE UNIVERSITY OF JEDDAH


Chalhoub University in partnership with the Department of Guidance and Vocational Rehabilitation at the University of Jeddah, hosted workshops for over 100 university students on Excel Fundamentals, Job Search Strategies, Soft Skills, and Sales Skills. Part of a Vision 2030 initiative, the programme empowers graduates and supports with job localization.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/6IR6FEQTzUudc_oAdRVpYQ/550725/DD2557FC47733CF7F08956126ECA0BDA/collaboration-with-jeddah-university.gif>
